name: Frog Office
description:
Working at an office can be boring. But not if you're a frog! It's Friday and the upcoming weekend is distracting you from doing any actual work. So why not goof around instead? Talk to your coworkers, discover secrets around the office, or find a game to kill time with. Made for Mini Jam 79: Frogs with the limitation of Only One Level.

WASD: Move

SPACE: Interact/Contextual Action

(You can also select dialogue options with the mouse!)

Credits:

Kevin Apolis - Director of Frog Synergy

Zach Melamed - Chief Music Operator

Outsourcing:

Made with Godot Engine, Aseprite, and Clip Studio

Dialogic (Godot Dialogue System) by Emilio

Generously free sound effects from sites like Freesound and GameSounds.xyz

Special Thanks:

The Japes Crew (Garrett, Zach) for ideas and spitballing and overall good bits

Mini Jam 79, for which this game is made for
